sn9.7:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma nagadatto kosalesu viharati annatarasmim vanasande.
sn9.7:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma nagadatto atikalena gamam pavisati, atidiva patikkamati.
sn9.7:1.3: Atha kho ya tasmim vanasande adhivattha devata ayasmato nagadattassa anukampika atthakama ayasmantam nagadattam samvejetukama yenayasma nagadatto tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam nagadattam gathahi ajjhabhasi:
sn9.7:4.1: Atha kho ayasma nagadatto taya devataya samvejito samvegamapaditi.
